title: Kevin Edwards Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Kevin Edwards? Check out all of Kevin Edwards's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogKevin Edwards Global Strategy Director, Awin Kevin Edwards Kevin is Awin's Global Strategy Director. Kevin has worked in affiliate marketing for 15 years and at Awin for more than 10 of those. In his role he’s responsible for empowering the company’s employees and clients with the right data and insights to make the most informed decisions about their campaigns. He also takes an active role in creating best practice standards and self-regulation. Kevin was previously Chair of the Affiliate Marketing Council in the UK, and continues to play an active role in the IAB’s Legislation and Standards’ Committee. Show more Marketing Intelligence 10 Tips to Create a Profitable Influencer Marketing Campaign Content Marketing by Kevin Edwards 8 Min. Dec 6, 2020 Wondering what Similarweb can do for your business? Give it a try or talk to our insights team — don’t worry, it’s free! Sign up for free Talk to an expert
